name: rox
description: Lightweight ActivityPub server & client with Misskey API compatibility

scripts.dev: bun run --cwd packages/backend dev & bun run --cwd packages/frontend dev
scripts.build: bun run --cwd packages/backend build && bun run --cwd packages/frontend build
scripts.typecheck: bun run --cwd packages/backend typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/frontend typecheck
scripts.db:generate: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && bun run --cwd packages/backend db:generate
scripts.db:migrate: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && bun run --cwd packages/backend db:migrate
scripts.db:studio: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && bun run --cwd packages/backend db:studio
scripts.db:backup: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && bun scripts/backup.ts
scripts.db:restore: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && bun scripts/restore.ts
scripts.db:export: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && bun packages/backend/scripts/export.ts
scripts.db:import: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && bun packages/backend/scripts/import.ts
